      • connect

        @Connect
@TestConnectivity
public void connect(@ConnectionKey@Optional
                                    String username,
                                    @Password@Optional
                                    String password)
             throws org.mule.api.ConnectionException
        Method invoked when a connection is required
        Parameters:
        username - A username. NOTE: Please use a dummy username if you have disabled authentication
        password - A password. NOTE: Leave empty if not required. If specified, the connector will try to login with this credentials
        Throws:
        org.mule.api.ConnectionException - if the connection is not established
